graph

Class AbstractGraph<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.AbstractGraph<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WordGraph

    public abstract class AbstractGraph<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<T>
    This is the default implementation of a generic graph structure It is currently non-directional but overriding addEdge and removeEdge should be all one needs to do to make the graph directional
    Author:
    Tom Leaman (thl5@aber.ac.uk)

      Returns true if elem is a node in this graph
